revised_title: A Study on the Composition and Properties of Turquoise Gemstones
tldr: The author examines the properties and composition of turquoise gemstones, discussing their origin, color variations, and chemical makeup. They propose that the stone is a rich copper ore and that its color can be attributed to the presence of copper. The author also distinguishes between true turquoise and pseudo-turquoise, which is derived from fossil ivory.
